text: @realDonaldTrump What was the covid-19 status of the thousands of troops you brought into DC? Had they all been tested? How many new cases will they (you) be responsible for? What about those dodgy looking pudgy bearded guys from the Bureau of Prisons? Plus, you know the protests were global (?)
